update saas_goods_load_detail
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
load_id = #{loadId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
load_code = #{loadCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
load_date = #{loadDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goods_code = #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
barcode = #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_generic_name = #{goodsGenericName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dosage_id = #{dosageId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
dosage_name = #{dosageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_specification = #{goodsSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manufacturer_id = #{manufacturerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_place = #{goodsPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approval_number = #{approvalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lot_id = #{lotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lot_number = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_date = #{productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
valid_date = #{validDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
src_shelf_id = #{srcShelfId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
src_shelf_name = #{srcShelfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target_shelf_id = #{targetShelfId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
target_shelf_name = #{targetShelfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
line_num = #{lineNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creater_code = #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_name = #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier_code = #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier_name = #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
src_shelf_status_desc = #{srcShelfStatusDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target_shelf_status_desc = #{targetShelfStatusDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.goods_code AS goodsCode, s.goods_generic_name AS goodsGenericName, s.dosage_name AS dosageName, s.unit_name AS unitName, s.goods_specification AS goodsSpecification, s.manufacturer, s.goods_place AS goodsPlace, s.lot_number AS lotNumber, date_format(s.product_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS productDate, date_format(s.valid_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS validUntil, s.src_shelf_name AS srcShelfName, s.target_shelf_name AS targetShelfName, s.quantity, s.remark, s.src_shelf_status_desc AS srcShelfStatusDesc, s.target_shelf_status_desc AS targetShelfStatusDesc, g.place FROM saas_goods_load_detail s LEFT JOIN saas_goods g ON g.id = s.goods_id where s.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} AND s.load_id = #{id}
select sum(quantity) quantity from saas_goods_load_detail where load_id = #{id} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
